titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2356) to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to provide bipartisan campaign reform.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Turner. Petition No: 107-3.
Motion to discharge the Committee on Rules filed by Mr. Turner. Assigned to the Discharge Calendar, Calendar No. 1.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 344, H. Res. 203 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 7/19/2001--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2356 (bipartisan campaign reform).
